issue.title: [C++] Implement scalar decimal cast kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10835](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10835). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, cast kernels involving decimal input or output are only supported on array inputs.
